tasks.title: Create Life Event Custom Object
tasks.description: Create the 'Life Event' custom object with fields: Event Name, Event Date, and Contact Lookup.
acceptance_criteria: Fields Event Name, Event Date, and Contact are available and correctly configured.

tasks.title: Configure Sharing Settings for Life Event
tasks.description: Set the sharing model for the Life Event custom object to Private.
acceptance_criteria: Life Event sharing settings are configured to Private.

tasks.title: Set Up Create Life Event Flow
tasks.description: Create a Flow that triggers when a user submits a new Life Event to create Life Event records.
acceptance_criteria: Flow tested to successfully create Life Event records.

tasks.title: Create Life Event Validation Trigger
tasks.description: Implement a Trigger to validate that Event Name and Event Date are populated before inserting a Life Event record.
acceptance_criteria: Validation tested to ensure no Life Event record can be created without required fields.

tasks.title: Configure Security Permissions for Life Event
tasks.description: Update Profile permissions to include Read, Create, Edit, Delete for the Life Event object.
acceptance_criteria: Access rights tested for specified roles.

tasks.title: Design Page Layout for Life Event
tasks.description: Create a user-friendly Page Layout for the Life Event with fields: Event Name, Event Date, Contact.
acceptance_criteria: Page Layout created correctly and assigned to appropriate profiles.
Page Layout visually validated for ease of use.

tasks.title: Conduct Testing and Validation
tasks.description: Perform end-to-end testing of Life Event functionality, including object creation, validation, and UI interactions.
acceptance_criteria: Bugs reported and retested after fixes.

key_risks: Delays in the setup of automation affecting the overall timeline.
Potential data access issues due to misconfigured permissions.
Complications during testing might require a rollback.
success_criteria: Life Event records can be successfully created through the UI.
Users can access the Life Event object according to established permissions.
